docs.snippet: The bond market followed the lines of least resistance yesterday and prices were irregularly lower. Total sales were $4,314,300, against $4,444,150 on Tuesday.

headline.main: BOND PRICES OFF IN SLOW MARKET; Sales of $4,314,300 Compare With $4,444,150 shown for Previous Day

docs.snippet: BUENOS AIRES, Argentina, Aug. 9.--The government has grounded an Italian-owned local airline and has begun an investigation of it as an organization serving the purposes of fascist penetration in Argentina.
docs.lead_paragraph: BUENOS AIRES, Argentina, Aug. 9.--The government has grounded an Italian-owned local airline and has begun an investigation of it as an organization serving the purposes of fascist penetration in Argentina.
docs.abstract: Alleged aid to fascism by Ital-owned airline investigated

headline.main: ARGENTINA CURBS AN ITALIAN AIRLINE; Company Is Being Investigated on Charges of Furthering Fascist Penetration PILOTS NAVAL OFFICERS Organization Has Been Getting Subsidy From Government --Traffic Insufficient
